attributes.action: Put a halt to the terrible "ITV Play" TV shows and other "Interactive TV gameshows!"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These shows steal our television and corrupt our youth. Dont let it happen, put a stop to "The Mint" "Glitterball" "Quizmania" and any other you can think off.... or at least make it so they dont just make the answers up as they go along.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
